Home.largest: Largest Global Black Tech Innovation Competition
Home.weAim: We aim to get 50% women, create an inclusive Hackathon via our beginner category, and create a sustainable impact by working with top teams post-hackathon in the
Home.weFollowUp: Unlike other Hackathons, we follow up, match participants to companies and mentors and support the projects that come out of AfricaHacks Hackathon. Join us this year!`
Home.largestBlackHackathon: We are the Largest black Tech Innovation competition in the world.
Home.excitedTo: Get Excited to learn, connect and create

Footer.isAPlatform: AfricaHacks is a platform for African and black youth to create and build companies. Our Hackathons are our flagship program. We started AfricaHacks to inspire a new generation of Nigerians and Africans to be makers, leaders and innovators.
